description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，原正国级领导人。曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记，后因在六四事件中同情学生运动并支持赵紫阳而被免职。复出后曾任电子工业部部长、全国政协副主席等职务。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, former national-level leader. He served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC. He was dismissed from his party leadership positions for sympathizing with the student movement and supporting Zhao Ziyang during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. After his political comeback, he served as Minister of Electronics Industry and Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育发展战略学会会长。
description.en: President of the Chinese Society of Education Development Strategy.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国科学院副院长、中国科学技术协会副主席。
description.en: Former Vice President of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and Vice Chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A major research university in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，曾任中共中央总书记、国务院总理。
description.en: A high-ranking politician in the People's Republic of China. He was the former General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡启恒是胡启立的妹妹。
description.en: Hu Qiheng is Hu Qili's younger sister.

description.zh-cn: 1946年至1951年在北京大学物理系、机械系学习。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Physics and the Department of Mechanics at Peking University from 1946 to 1951.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，因同情学生运动，支持时任中共中央总书记赵紫阳，而被免去党内领导职务。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he was dismissed from his party leadership positions for sympathizing with the student movement and supporting the then-General Secretary Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件中，同情学生运动并支持赵紫阳。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he sympathized with the student movement and supported Zhao Ziyang.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在中共十三届四中全会上被免去政治局委员、常委，中央书记处书记的职务。
description.en: At the 4th Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee of the CPC, he was removed from his positions as a member of the Politburo, a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, and a secretary of the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 胡启立受到时任共青团中央负责人胡耀邦的赏识，并在其推荐下被增选为团中央书记处候补书记。
description.en: Hu Qili was appreciated by Hu Yaobang, then head of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, and was co-opted as an alternate secretary of the Secretariat of the CYL Central Committee upon his recommendation.

description.zh-cn: 1987年胡耀邦下台后，在赵紫阳的保护下，胡启立并没有受到影响。
description.en: After Hu Yaobang stepped down in 1987, Hu Qili was not affected under the protection of Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，胡启立被下放到“五七干校”劳动，直到1972年才被恢复工作。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution began, Hu Qili was sent to a 'May Seventh Cadre School' for labor and was not reinstated until 1972.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东警告共青团中央，称胡耀邦、胡克实、胡启立等负责人犯了“错误”。
description.en: Mao Zedong warned the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, stating that leaders such as Hu Yaobang, Hu Keshi, and Hu Qili had made 'mistakes'.

description.zh-cn: 粉碎四人帮后，胡启立的政治生涯得以恢复和发展，历任清华党委副书记兼副校长，团中央书记处书记等职务。
description.en: After the smashing of the Gang of Four, Hu Qili's political career was restored and developed, and he subsequently served as Deputy Party Secretary and Vice President of Tsinghua University, and Secretary of the Secretariat of the CYL Central Committee.

description.en: During his tenure as Minister of Electronics Industry, he actively promoted the establishment of China Unicom.

description.zh-cn: 在担任电子工业部部长期间，倡导电信业改革，最终促使邮政和电信分离，相关职能并入1998年成立的信息产业部。
description.en: During his tenure as Minister of Electronics Industry, he advocated for telecommunications reform, which eventually led to the separation of post and telecommunications, with related functions merged into the Ministry of Information Industry established in 1998.

description.en: When Hu Qili served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, the Chairman was Li Ruihuan.
